name: A.S.G.
description:
ANOTHER SPACE GAME

Our Sun has turned into a Black hole and it already ate Mercury, Venus and our Moon.
and now it's earth's time.
will you be able to save the earth?
or flee with a spaceship
or worse, fail and destroy our future.

Another Space Game is a game made in 10 days for #dreamhackaustinjam.
The main idea of the game is to survive the solar apocalypse and save as many people as you can. but beware, everything you do and didn't do will affect the progress of your gameplay.
Earth has 4 abilities which have a different effect on Earth. example: tsunami will reflect asteroids but it will kill many people, destroy some structures and environment.
That's why you have to plan out your gameplay carefully because every choice has a consequence.

CONTROLS

Left-Right-Up-Down keys to move the earth

Q-W-E-R to use earth's abilities and Z-X-C-V to humans abilities or you can L-Click on them to use.

GAMEPLAY TIPS

You can learn more about the game inside it by clicking info icon located in the top right corner of the game.

Every Variable has different effect and each variable has connection with one another that's why you should pay attention to changes within your variables.

Like; Using Volcano ability(Q) will create a dust cloud which will destroy the environment and will increase temperature over time. which will affect other variables;
temperature rise will reduce population, environment, and structures and environment loss will result in population decline.

That's why you should pay attention to average temperature and environment because they have the biggest impact on others.

Evade planets & asteroids belts carefully because they will give you an incredible disadvantage in your gameplay.

Consider using the spaceship to escape but beware if you use some abilities they will destroy the construction of the spaceship.

Some Sound effects might sound horrible that's because I didn't have time to polish them & filtered them to sound more like in space sounds.
